help.desc: Gives usage information on a specific command

params.cmd-name: The command to get help with

uptime.desc: Says how long the bot has been online for

source.desc: Links to the bot's source code

params.sides: The amount of sides per die
params.dice: The amount of dice to roll, defaults to 1

pasta.desc: Outputs a copypasta specified by the input parameters

params.pasta-name: The name of the copypasta to be outputted

pricecheck.desc: Price checks an item on the ge

params.item: The name of the item to be price checked
params.amount: The amount of this item, defaults to 1

slayer.desc: Calculates xp gained from your slayer task

params.amount: The number of kills assigned, defaults to 1
params.aura: The tier of the slayer aura used, defaults to 0

wikipedia.desc: Links to the first result on wikipedia

params.article: The article to link to or search for
params.lang: The wikipedia language, defaults to en

translate.desc: Translates a phrase from one language to another

1rm.desc: Calculates one rep max using the Epley formula

params.reps: The amount of full reps performed

convert.desc: Converts values from one unit to another

params.dp: How many decimal places to round to, defaults to 2

currency.desc: Converts money from one currency to another

params.dp: How many decimal places to round to, defaults to 2

youtube.desc: Gets videos from youtube based on a search query

setprefix.desc: Sets the command prefix for this channel

params.value: What to set the command prefix to

eval.desc: Evaluates a mathematical expression. Not literally eval()!

setvar.desc: Sets a variable for the evaluation context

params.varname: The name of the variable to be assigned to
params.value: The new value of the variable

setvars.desc: Same as setvar, but sets multiple variables in one command

params.varnames: The names of the variables, for instance "x, y, z"
params.value: The values of the variables, for instance "1, e, sqrt(x)"

ree.desc: REEEEEs so you don't have to

params.action: What to do: open, close, create, delete, show
params.options: The options for the poll, if creating a new poll, separated by semicolons.

params.option: The name of the option you want to vote for; run 'poll show' to get a list of the options

votei.desc: Vote on the current poll, by index

params.option: The index of the option you want to vote for; run 'poll show' to get a list of the indices
